<Link id="l00098" /><CodeLine lineNumber="98"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// Addrecs referring to any of the given loops are expanded in post-inc</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00099" /><CodeLine lineNumber="99"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// mode. For example, expanding &#123;1,+,1&#125;&lt;L&gt; in post-inc mode returns the add</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00100" /><CodeLine lineNumber="100"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// instruction that adds one to the phi for &#123;0,+,1&#125;&lt;L&gt;, as opposed to a new</Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00115" /><CodeLine lineNumber="115"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// When true, SCEVExpander tries to expand expressions in &quot;canonical&quot; form.</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00116" /><CodeLine lineNumber="116"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// When false, expressions are expanded in a more literal form.</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00117" /><CodeLine lineNumber="117"><Highlight kind="comment">  ///</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00118" /><CodeLine lineNumber="118"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// In &quot;canonical&quot; form addrecs are expanded as arithmetic based on a</Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00206" /><CodeLine lineNumber="206"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00207" /><CodeLine lineNumber="207"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// Erase the contents of the InsertedExpressions map so that users trying</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00208" /><CodeLine lineNumber="208"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// to expand the same expression into multiple BasicBlocks or different</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00209" /><CodeLine lineNumber="209"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// places within the same BasicBlock can do so.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
